portrait_r.sjis: 人間ノ 話シ声ヲ 確認 コチラニ 向カッテキテイマス
portrait_r.ascii: Human Voices Confirmed. They Are Approaching.

portrait_r.sjis: 人の気配がする 近いぞ！
portrait_r.ascii: I can sense someone They're close!

portrait_r.sjis: ニンゲンがいる 近いぞ！
portrait_r.ascii: There are humans here They're close!

portrait_r.sjis: 誰かいますわ こっちにきます！
portrait_r.ascii: Someone's here They're coming!

portrait_r.sjis: ヤバい！ かくれなきゃ！
portrait_r.ascii: Crap! We gotta hide!

sjis.three_dots: でも大変だったでしょ？ この間の地震で橋がおちてたし

ascii.three_dots: That was tough wasn't it? Who would've thought the bridge would collapse?

portrait_r.name: unknown
portrait_r.sjis: 少しおどろいたが 道なんかいくらでもあるからな
portrait_r.ascii: It was a bit surprising, but there are other ways around.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: ま、おかげで助かったよ ありがとうな
portrait_l.ascii: Well, you did save me. Thanks for that.

portrait_r.name: unknown
portrait_r.sjis: 礼なんて、いいっスよ あんなのは軽いもんですから！ なぜなら、オレは
portrait_r.ascii: You don't need to thank me. That much was nothing! And that's because

portrait_r.name: unknown
portrait_r.sjis: 無敵で不死身っスから！
portrait_r.ascii: I am the strongest, the invincible!

portrait_r.sjis: ソノヨウデス
portrait_r.ascii: It Appears So.

male.sjis: さっきのセリフ なんか、アニキみたいだったな

female.sjis: さっきのセリフ、なんだか アニキみたいだったけど

portrait_r.ascii: That guy He kind of sounded like Bro.

portrait_r.sjis: あにき？ アナタノ オ兄サン デスカ？
portrait_r.ascii: Bro? Is He Part Of Your Family?

portrait_r.sjis: あ、そうじゃなくて、あだ名 ロブ親方の友達だった人だよ 鍛冶職人の男の人なんだ
portrait_r.ascii: Oh, no, that's just a nickname. He's a friend of Master Rob. He's a blacksmith.

portrait_r.sjis: ちょっと行ったところにある プロスバンって町にすんでて 昔はいっしょに修行もしたけど
portrait_r.ascii: I trained with him once a long time ago in Prosban

portrait_r.sjis: ロブ親方が死んでからは 一度も会ってないなぁ
portrait_r.ascii: But I haven't seen him since Master Rob passed away

portrait_r.sjis: ソノ人ガ ヤッテキタノデスカ？
portrait_r.ascii: Why Would He Be Here?

portrait_r.sjis: そのようじゃ
portrait_r.ascii: Looks like it.

male.sjis: さっきのセリフ なんか、アニキみたいだったな

female.sjis: さっきのセリフ、なんだか アニキみたいだったけど

portrait_r.ascii: That guy He kind of sounded like Bro.

portrait_r.sjis: アニキ？ おぬし、兄がいたのか？
portrait_r.ascii: Bro? You have a brother?

portrait_r.sjis: あ、そうじゃなくて、あだ名 ロブ親方の友達だった人だよ 鍛冶職人の男の人なんだ
portrait_r.ascii: Oh, no, that's just a nickname. He's a friend of Master Rob. He's a blacksmith.

portrait_r.ascii: I trained with him once a long time ago in Prosban

portrait_r.sjis: ロブ親方が死んでからは 一度も会ってないなぁ
portrait_r.ascii: But I haven't seen him since Master Rob passed away

portrait_r.sjis: そのアニキがやってきたのかの？
portrait_r.ascii: And you think it's him?

portrait_r.sjis: らしいな
portrait_r.ascii: Seems like it.

portrait_r.sjis: わかんないけど 今はとにかく はぐれ退治に行こう！
portrait_r.ascii: I don't know Anyway, right now we need to take care of that Stray!
